book.synopsis: During the First World War five French soldiers, accused of a cowardly attempt to evade duty, are bundled into no-man"s land and certain death. Five bodies are later recovered, the families are notified that the men died in the line of duty and the whole, distasteful incident appears closed. After the war the fiance of one of the men receives a letter which hints at what might have happened. Mathilde Donnay determines to discover the fate of her beloved amid the carnage of battle.
